articles.author: James Whitbrook
articles.title: Every Moment You’re Playing Indiana Jones and the Great Circle Feels Like Torture - Gizmodo
articles.description: Bethesda and MachineGames' take on the Lucasfilm icon delivers a fantastic Indiana Jones story, wrapped up in clunky, miserable gameplay.
articles.content: Indiana Jones should be the perfect video game hero. He solves puzzles, he shoots Nazis, he leaps and swings through an international cavalcade of locations primed for platforming. His very existence… [+11366 chars]
